--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::::
> 
> The drunk slows down and stops before reaching Pacifix, 
transforming 
> into robot mode. He wasn't drunk for now, and the effects wouldn't 
> come back untill his battle centers went idle after a little while. 
> When they took over, the energon's effect was temporarily 
deactivated.
> 
> "Join you?" he says to Pacifix, "From how long taking a group of 
five 
> enemies took you, I'd say you need some help, yeah. What's the 
> mission you need us to join you for?"
> 
> 
> 
>

I

will
